Name: Virtual Islands
About the game: Enjoy a hybrid of realistic putting and arcade style mini-golf in a chill, virtual, tropical island setting! - 18 fun Holes - Global & Local leader-boards to challenge guests and the world - Bonus driving range! - Drive-able golf cart!
